org.agreement_technologies.service.map_planner

Class StateMemoization

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agreement_technologies.service.map_planner.StateMemoization

  • public class StateMemoization
extends java.lang.Object
    StateMemoization class stores the generated plans to avoid expand repeated plans during the search. Compare frontier states is much faster than compare partial-order plans, but no so accurate (see Memoization class).
    Since:
    1.0

    • Constructor Summary

      StateMemoization(int numVars)
      Creates an empty map.

      • search

        public IPlan search(POPIncrementalPlan p,
           POPAction a)
        Checks if the addition of an action a to a base plan p leads to a repeated state.
        Parameters:
        p - Plan
        a - Action to add
        Returns:
        Plan in the map that leads to the same state as the given plan after adding the given action; null, if the addition of the action to the plan leads to a new state
        Since:
        1.0
